channel.title: How do i make certain items say certain things?
channel.description: im confused i know you cant do it on the server, but where do i change it on the client?? For example a dragon dagger(s) can i change its name to mod wepon or something? if so, how???

item.title: How do i make certain items say certain things?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.source: How do i make certain items say certain things?

item.title: How do i make certain items say certain things?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

class 8 client side, put something like this underneath your other weapons…

if(i == 5698){ class8.aString170 = "Moderator Dagger"; }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make certain items say certain things?

item.source: How do i make certain items say certain things?

item.title: How do i make certain items say certain things?
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Yes, this is possible, and it is server sided, so you dont change anything in the client.
Go into the server files and look for item.cfg. Rename it to item.txt so you can edit it. Then press ctrl + f search for “dragon_dagger”, remember they are underscores, not spaces. Change the name to what you want, and if you want to edit the “examine” option detail then modify the sentence after the item name. Change the name back to “item.cfg”, and… Your done.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make certain items say certain things?
